hadiths.text: Amr bin Shu'aib narrated from his father, from his grandfather, that:The Prophet [SAW] said: "What intoxicates in large amounts, a small amount of it is unlawful

chapter.ara-name: باب تَحْرِيمِ كُلِّ شَرَابٍ أَسْكَرَ كَثِيرُهُ
chapter.eng-name: Prohibition of Every Drink that Intoxicates in Large Amounts
